description: Details of an enhanced sound insulation pursuant to condition 15 of planning application reference: 204654FUL dated 25.05.2022 'Redevelopment of land at the rear of Nos 11 to 15 The Mall to provide a 9 storey building with basement, comprising 34 self-contained flats , (following part demolition of the existing extensions and structures to the rear of Nos. 11 to 15); Proposed E(b) Use (Restaurant) at basement; Existing E(b) Restaurant Use at ground floor of No. 13 The Mall to be extended into the rear of No. 12, change of use of ground floor of No. 12 The Mall from Retail to Residential (to form Entrance Lobby to Flats), to include alteration to front facade; alterations to existing air extract plant at Nos. 11, 12 and 13; bicycle, refuse and recycling stores (Part Retrospective).'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
